title: Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server.
body: Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server.( i had this problem )

replies.body: im able to log in but once im playing i get my connection issues and a lot of the time it last the whole match and i have to leave the match just so it starts working but if i do then i get a penalty and have to wait 20 mins before a match so i really dont want to do that. so im sitting in front of my laptop everytime for over a 50 mins before i leave just in case so i do not get a penalty at all. my wifi does not go down at all, my fps stays between 60-100 and this game is thee only thing downloaded on my laptop so its not my laptop at all. whats going on. mine runs on **Windows** by the way

Are you seeing this issue when trying to log in? If so, it may be related to an ongoing issue we're investigating with some players on Centurylink's network, which we're tracking on [this thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/B2VFcQKX-stuck-at-logging-in-after-maintenance). Our network technicians are currently working with Centurylink to investigate and resolve the issue.

Let me know if this is not happening at the login screen or if you have any other questions.

Hello i've been having trouble logging in as well. I keep getting "Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server." Im in seattle and have century link. Is there any updates? Reply when you can :)

The CenturyLink issues were only in select areas and have since been resolved. At the time of posting this, there are some issues going on with our login server that will be resolved as soon as they can, but if you continue to see this issue afterwards, work through our [Login Issues guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues)

Let me know if you have any questions
Still happening here in Seattle. What about you guys?
Having the same problem and its still not fixed, will calling century link fix any issues? they are usually clueless when it comes down to problems like this.
I am also having this problem and am new to the game and do have century link

There are currently issues with Century Link's routing to the LoL servers particularly from Texas. 

To assist Riot with zeroing in on the issue, you can reply to Riot Wulalowe's posts [in this thread.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/B2VFcQKX-stuck-at-logging-in-after-maintenance)

Ensure to include to a [Traceroute](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2) to **192.64.174.65.**
